companyStory:
We are a consulting firm offering services in Architectural design and Project management. We focus on design excellence through responsible development and technological innovation.

The firm was established in 2012 with the intent to provide complete and high industry-level design services or the full range of projects within the built environment, including Residential, Commercial and Institutional projects.
mission: To create sustainable built environments that enhance the quality of life
vision: To expand our sphere of influence in creation of sustainable built environments globally

team.name: Mbogo Kimani
team.description: Arch. Mbogo Kimani (MAAK), BAS (UON), B. ARCH (UON), is a Principal Partner at DIL. He has over 15 years of experience in Architectural Design, Contract and Construction Project Management. He believes every development must be sustainable and user based and integrity must be expressed even in built form. His experience brings diversity to the experience pool within Decalogue.

team.name: Ernest Gichugu
team.description: Arch. Ernest Gicugu (MAAK), B. ARCH (UON), is a Principal Partner at DIL. He has over 15 years of experience in Architectural Design, Contract and Construction Project Management and has developed the capacity to handle all aspects of various types of projects. He believes that integrity, a keen understanding of the clientâ€™s brief, correct advice to the client, and a skilled and cohesive project team results in successful projects.

team.name: Peter Kogi
team.description: Peter Kogi is an Assistant Architect at DIL. He joined the firm in 2016. He holds a diploma in Architecture (KIBHT) and has over 5 years of experience in Architectural Design. His diligence, attitude towards work and hunger for perfection has led to commendable growth in Architectural practice.

team.name: Job Githaga
team.description: Job Githaga, B. ARCH (JKUAT). He has over 10 years of experience in Architectural design. He is a creative thinker whose work spans across multiple disciplines and a variety of scale. He is driven by a desire to envision new modes of living using design as a vehicle to imagine a brighter future.

team.name: Rey Reagan
team.description: Reyreagan Ongalo Odhiambo joined Decalogue International Ltd on August 2017 on attachment and later rejoined on August 2018 as an Intern upon completion of Diploma in Architecture from Thika Technical Training Institute and underwent training in preparation of Scheme and detailed design drawings of projects of varying scales. These projects have awarded him an array of technical skills and a vast wealth of construction Knowledge.

team.name: Lucia Mwaura
team.description: Lucia Mwaura holds a Diploma in Building Technology (KIST). She joined the firm in 2021 as an Administrative Assistant/Office Manager. She is the Principal Office Administrator in charge of day to day running of the office. She is the link between the Technical Staff and the Client ensuring the smooth flow of information and fast delivery of documents/Mails to Clients, Consultants, Contractors, and Sub-contractors.
